item.title: Completed the Deeplearning.ai Tensorflow for AI course
item.description: Finished the Introduction to TensorFlow for Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning course: Name:Introduction to TensorFlow for Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning Issuing Organization: Coursera Issue Date: August 2022 Expiration Date: This certification does not expire Credential ID: A4ZDPDW5PC42 Credential URL:https://www.coursera.org/account/accomplishments/certificate/A4ZDPDW5PC42 coursera-deeplearning-tensorflow-certificate Useful worksheet: https://github.com/https-deeplearning-ai/tensorflow-1-public/blob/main/C1/W4/ungraded_labs/C1_W4_Lab_1_image_generator_no_validation.ipynb use https://pixabay.com/ for finding additional images to test model.

item.title: Coursera - introduction to tensorflow
item.description: Week 1 Assignment: Housing Prices In this exercise youâ€™ll try to build a neural network that predicts the price of a house according to a simple formula. Imagine that house pricing is as easy as: A house has a base cost of 50k, and every additional bedroom adds a cost of 50k. This will make a 1 bedroom house cost 100k, a 2 bedroom house cost 150k etc. How would you create a neural network that learns this relationship so that it would predict a 7 bedroom house as costing close to 400k etc.
